name: The Tails At My Paws -Demo
description:
A Warrior Cats inspired RPG game featuring a full life from kit-warrior and maybe more :)

This game features custom clans (MothClan of which the mc lives in, FeatherClan, DuskClan, and HollowClan) and all custom cats. There is plans for fighting mechanics, lots of quests and story-telling, being able to choose mates and have a meaningful relationship with them, choices that acutally affect story, in depth characters who you can choose your relationship with and so much more.

This is just a teensy little baby demo compared to the entire project! The demo will probably be added onto more until I reach the full game, which since I'm putting so much time and effort into will probably cost a tiny bit of money (No more than 5 dollars), but I will always have a free version with less content available!
